data.title: Malawi Cities Database
data.meta_description: A database of 29 prominent cities in Malawi.  Includes a city's latitude, longitude, district and other variables of interest. MIT license.  CSV, Excel and JSON formats. Comprehensive database available.
data.text:
Below is a list of 29 prominent cities in Malawi. Each row includes a city's latitude, longitude, district and other variables of interest. This is a subset of all 7,508 places in Malawi (and only some of the fields) that you'll find in our World Cities Database. We're releasing this data subset for free under an MIT license. You're free to use the data below for personal or commercial applications. The data below can be downloaded in .csv, .json, and .xlsx formats.

Notable Cities: The capital of Malawi is Lilongwe, which is in the district of Lilongwe. The largest city in Malawi is Blantyre, with an urban population of 1,895,973.
